data.name: WordBed
data.detailed_description:
It's you against WordBed for the highest score. Find as many words as you can and then have your words eliminated from the board.

The board is then compressed down and you continue playing. When you are done, WordBed gives it a try. An array of game sounds confirm every board action taken. Change letters for higher scores.

BEAT WordBed and get an audio surprise.

Features:


  • Large word database: over 250,000 words
  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • Enjoy exciting background music
  • Change letters


It’s you versus WordBed for the best word search score

*** See website for full play instructions ***

data.short_description: WordBed is a word search game that pits you against WordBed for the highest score. Find as many words as you can then have your words eliminated from the board over and over until you can find no more words. Then watch WordBed play the same board. But you have an advantage you can use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:  64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, including the Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, including the Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
